1398950.name: Savage Tower Defense
1398950.description:
Savage Tower Defense is a tower defense that you need to defend your family and your home against enemies. The idea of the game is to be chaotic so after each wave of enemies, you will encounter a greater number of enemies.
What you'll find in the game:

- 4 different towers (a fast-firing turret, a turret that slows enemies down and 2 towers that have area damage);

- 18 levels in campaign mode;

- 2 levels without end (no wave limit);

- at least 6 different types of enemies;

This game is in early access and is being developed by a single person.
